website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a Michael Kors bag with simplistic, attractive appeal that will never go out of style, this beautifully crafted satchel won't disappoint.
pros: Offers ample interior space with several pockets and 2 ways to carry it – by handle or with the removable strap
Made of real leather and available in numerous color options
Comes with a dust bag for storage
cons: It has a stiff feel, but this is a characteristic of saffiano leather

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purse - Michael Kors quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this purse - ordered the black color after already having a red one for some time. The material is very sturdy - doesn't show dirt or scratches. The size is perfect - small enough to use for every occasion but big enough to hold sunglasses or an umbrella if needed. Love having the handles as well as being able to use it "hands free".
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Vanover

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and she loves it. Th only issue is that I had to take it to a leather shop because one of the letters were not straight.
customer_reviews.author: Linda In Chicago

customer_reviews.title: ... large as I was looking for but I still love it! Its very sturdy and the snaps on ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as large as I was looking for but I still love it! Its very sturdy and the snaps on the bottom keep the bag protected and would make for a great everyday wearer. I use is occasionally so I can't speak on how well it would hold up if used all the time but its such great quality I'm sure it would do just fine. The overall look of this bag is stunning and it adds pizzaz to even my simplest looks.
customer_reviews.author: Davida Gray

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this purse! It's the perfect size and is exactly how I expected it. Wish the crossover strap was a bit longer so it can fit comfortably and so the purse can hang lower when it's used as a crossover but overall, wonderful product! It came in great packaging complete with a Michael Kors storage bag. Absolutely delighted with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: bbchris

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Michael Kors handbag.LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love Love ❤️ this is authentic Michael Kors handbag and i am happy with my purchase. Great packaging everything is factory wrapped and it comes with dust bag i waited a month of constant use to review and it’s still looking just as it dis when I unwrapped it i am in pure LOVE. Thanks Amazon very happy customer. Purchased bag at listed price no discount honest buyer and honest review. Great seller.
customer_reviews.author: LovingLife

customer_reviews.title: NOT REAL :(
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I just purchased this bag and the bag I received in the mail is definitely a fake because I have the real one as well. All the other reviews looked good so I was hoping the bag would be real but sadly it is not and you cannot return because it’s sold by a separate vendor from amazon. The “Michael Kors” lettering on the outside is much higher than shown in the picture and the “Michael kors” on the zip pocket inside is in embroidered in gold instead of engraved on leather. Overall the bag appears to be decent quality but this doesn’t make up for the fact that it’s very expensive and not real. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: you are good to go
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. My wife's African Grey parrot, General Beauregard, ate some of this purse, which was a gift from my son. My advice is don't buy this purse if you live in Africa or some portions of the Amazon rain forest. Absent that, you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fortin

customer_reviews.title: the quality is excellent, the price was reasonable and delivery was very ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hand bag for my Mom, she absolutely loves it - the short handles, the overall size and especially the metal round things on the bottom of the hand bag, so that when she sits it down somewhere, it is not sitting directly on the surface, if that makes sense. She also loves the simplicity of the interior, the quality is excellent, the price was reasonable and delivery was very prompt. Oh and the hand bag was very well packaged. Very happy with my purchase, thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I generally wouldn't order a designer bag on Amazon. But my daughter wanted it for Christmas and Michael Kors ran out of them. I ordered in desperation. As soon as I looked at the bag I knew it was not authentic but a good knockoff. I've owned bags that cost as much as $1300 and I know quality. I have also owned numerous MK bags over the years. This is not authentic. It's a really good knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This purse is exactly what major department stores carry, but for a more affordable price. Before the purchase, I read reviews in order to be better informed, thus I made the decision to purchase the bag based on the favorable reviews.. The quality is excellent, and my daughter was pleased beyond words about her birthday present that she had been drooling over for quite some time. I am all about quality, and this bag delivers! Furthermore, I ordered on Amazon Prime, and it arrived on the exact day that i was told it would arrive. This was a win win purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Logo misspelled
customer_reviews.text: Pocket book is fine, but the logo was missing the "I" and was crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and the bag can be paired with any ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift for my brother’s girlfriend. Very good quality and the bag can be paired with any outfit not to mention it looks stunning. I recommend getting it.
customer_reviews.author: mvang_00

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop staring at my Michael Kors bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this purse for so long! After staring at it on my wishlist for over a year, it was time to splurge and add it to my cart already. It did NOT disappoint! It's a beautiful bag, exquisite quality, and I might be in love with this bag. : )
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Price was good. It has been a few years and the straps are fraying a bit, but pretty good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This handbag is excellent quality. I studied it carefully after receiving it, and did not see any of the telltale signs of a fake. (I'll let you google that information for yourself.) The goldtone hardware is shiny and sturdy. The handbag was properly packaged so it was not scratched or crushed in any way. It also came with a white drawstring pouch for storage. I am completely satisfied with this purse and would buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: TheBookishBookworm

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking and I’ll made
customer_reviews.text: Not very nice and truly annoying that they put the magnetic closure back to front so it doesn’t close.

customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this purse. I only use it every once in awhile because I acrry a diaper bag but I'm a little disappointed as it's already starting to shed the black in spots

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Excellent Quality Handbag

I couldnt be happier with my purchase, its just big enough for an uprgrade but its not to big. The material is really nice and it even comes with a little manual that describes how to make your purses' material to last!

customer_reviews.title: Black Selma
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a MK Medium Selma in black and I love it! It's a little small but it is in the medium size. Everything came packaged as if you were to buy it at a MK store. I know because I used to work MK stock at Macy's. I made the order on a Sunday, and it shipped out on a Tuesday with Monday being a holiday and I received it Wednesday noon. Product is great, shipping is great.

product_meta.title: MICHAEL Michael Kors Selma Satchel, Black, Medium
product_meta.description:
Sturdy saffiano leather accentuates the clean lines of this mid-sized MICHAEL Kors satchel. The inset top zip opens to a logo-lined interior with 1 pocket and a spring-lock keychain. Optional, adjustable shoulder strap. Dust bag included.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :12.99 x 3.94 x 7.87 inches; 2 Pounds
 * Item model number :MK 30S3GLMS2L-001
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :March 1, 2016
 * Manufacturer :MICHAEL Michael Kors
 * ASIN :B00IM5JJ48


 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars252 ratings Sturdy saffiano leather accentuates the clean lines of this mid-sized MICHAEL Kors satchel. The inset top zip opens to a logo-lined interior with 1 pocket and a spring-lock keychain. Optional, adjustable shoulder strap. Dust bag included.
